headline: Deckers Outdoor (NYSE:DECK) Sees 11% Price Decline Amid Broader Economic Uncertainties
summary: Deckers Outdoor (NYSE:DECK) saw its stock price decline by 11% last week amidst a turbulent period for the stock market. Despite the broader market's downturn, the Dow Jones and other major indices showed signs of recovery by rallying towards the end of the week. However, the market's volatility, exacerbated by concerns over tariffs and economic uncertainties, did not spare Deckers. During the same period, other sectors experienced rebounds, such as the tech sector with Nvidia and Palantir...
